issue.title: [C++] Wrong type_name used for directory partitioning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14016](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14016). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Trivial change to fix the type_name provided by DirectoryPartitioning.  It appears to have been left from when it was called SchemaPartitioner.  See: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6153

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14016?focusedCommentId=17416984) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11172
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11172>
